text.section: Records kept under this section may be inspected and copied during ordinary business hours at the reasonable request, and at the expense, of any partner.

law.history: Amended 2010 Ky. Acts ch. 151, sec. 122, effective January 1, 2011. -- Repeal the prior repeal contained in 2006 Ky. Acts ch. 149, sec. 239, which was to have been effective January 1, 2008, 2007 Ky. Acts ch. 137, sec. 180, effective June 26, 2007. -- Repealed 2006 Ky. Acts ch. 149, sec. 239, effective January 1, 2008. -- Amended 1994 Ky. Acts ch. 389, sec. 116, effective July 15, 1994. -- Created 1988 Ky. Acts ch. 284, sec. 5, effective July 15, 1988.
